product_name: LifeProof Bike Bar Mount - iPhone 4/4S Case
long_description: This LifeProof Bike and Bar mount works with the LifeProof iPhone(R) 4/4S case (sold separately) to let you keep your iPhone front and center on your next 2-wheeled adventure in any weather. Release latch makes it easy to click your phone in or pull it out of the case with 1 hand. Light honeycomb construction with premium high-impact materials offers an optimal strength-to-weight ratio. The LifeProof Bike and Bar mount preserves access to buttons, controls and mic; it's adjustable for portrait or landscape orientation and holds the phone facing in or out.
short_description: This LifeProof Bike and Bar mount works with the LifeProof iPhone(R) 4/4S case (sold separately) to let you keep your iPhone front and center on your next 2-wheeled adventure in any weather.
